name: In space no one can hear you Meow
name_original: In space no one can hear you Meow
description:
Submission for UE4Megajam. Inspired by the original Alien , you play as a cat in the middle of a hostile alien attack and must reach the escape shuttle to get back down to earth.

Use your feline wits to overcome hostile aliens, a critically damaged ship and even gravity itself.

In case you get lost. Follow the color RED.

Controls are :
WASD - Move

Left mouse click - hit buttons

E - Drag objects

Shift - Run (when unlocked)

R - Restarts game
